channel.title: Melvin Jones Repol - Software Engineer
channel.description: A self taught Software Engineer i started self studying back in 2018 when i found programming very interesting thing to study. I have also experiences in Web Development, Search Engine Optimization(SEO) and have knowledge about Computer Hardwares.
